sentence.text: [Hypothyroidism as the result of drug interaction between ferrous sulfate and levothyroxine].
We report a case of drug-drug interaction between ferrous sulfate and l-thyroxin
A 95-year-old woman treated successfully with l-thyroxin for many years received ferrous sulfate for anemia
This association led rapidly to recurrence of hypothyroidism with elevated serum than TSH level which completely resolved after withdrawal of iron therapy
Interaction was confirmed after both drugs were daily administrated separately without recurrence of hypothyroidism
